OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: IP to trigger disconnectOrderLineItems method for Deleting OLIs. Expected parameters: 1) Order Id: String 2) Root Ids of OLIs selected for deletion: List of Object with attribute "Id"(example: [{Id:"rootId1"},{Id:"rootId2"},{Id:"rootId3"}])
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: ESM_BulkDeleteOrderLineItemsExecuteProcess

omniProcessElements.name: RemoteAction1
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "additionalInput" : { "RootItemIds" : "%transformedResponse:itemsToProcessSubsetList%", "SalesOrderId" : "%setValues:SalesOrderId%", "include" : "validatePromotions" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : false, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "label" : "RemoteAction1", "remoteClass" : "B2BCmexAppHandler", "remoteMethod" : "disconnectOrderLineItems", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "responseNode", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: SendNotificationFailedToDelete
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "body" : "Selected order line items couldn't be bulk deleted.", "customNotificationTypeName" : "ESMNotifications", "targetID" : "%additionalData:SalesOrderId%", "title" : "Bulk deletion failed", "userID" : "%additionalData:userId%" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "disableChainable" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "%responseNode:errorCode% != 'INVOKE-200'", "failOnStepError" : false, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "integrationProcedureKey" : "ESM_SendAppNotification", "label" : "IntegrationProcedureAction2", "remoteOptions" : { }, "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: TransformArrayOfStringsToArrayOfObjects
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { "" : "" }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "ESMBulkOliRootItemsCodeTransform", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "LISTSIZE(%setValues:RootItemIds%) != 1", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorTransformAction1", "responseJSONNode" : "transformedResponse", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
